name: Orbital WeaVR
description:
Launch rainbow missiles into orbit around a checkered planet. Watch as patterns unfold from the crossing trails.

Press the green button to fire a missile wherever you are looking.

Press the red to detonate the missiles, which will self detonate after 1 minute.

Use the left, right, up and down buttons to change your viewpoint.

Windows only, Oculus Rift DK2 Runtime 0.7 and a LeapMotion controller.

There is no menu, press Windows key to escape to the Start bar, right click on the Orbital_WeaVR button, and select "Close Window".
